Klasse Task

java.lang.Object
Project.logic.Task
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IHasCategory
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
PersonalTask, WorkTask
public abstract class Task extends Object implements IHasCategory
The Task class is an abstract representation of a task with common properties such as title, description, priority, due date, and completion status. It implements the IHasCategory interface and provides a framework for specialized task types.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Task

      public Task(String title, String description, int priority, LocalDate dueDate)
      Constructs a new Task with the specified details.
      Parameter:
      title - A String representing the title of the task.
      description - A String providing a description of the task.
      priority - An int representing the priority level of the task (1 is high, 5 is low).
      dueDate - A LocalDate indicating the due date of the task.

  • Methodendetails

      public String getTitle()
      Retrieves the title of the task.
      Gibt zurück:
      A String representing the title of the task.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Retrieves the description of the task.
      Gibt zurück:
      A String representing the description of the task.

    • getPriority

      public int getPriority()
      Retrieves the priority of the task.
      Gibt zurück:
      An int representing the priority level of the task (1 is high, 5 is low).

    • getDueDate

      public LocalDate getDueDate()
      Retrieves the due date of the task.
      Gibt zurück:
      A LocalDate representing the due date of the task.

    • isCompleted

      public boolean isCompleted()
      Checks if the task is completed.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the task is completed; false otherwise.

    • setCompleted

      public void setCompleted(boolean completed)
      Updates the completion status of the task.
      Parameter:
      completed - true to mark the task as completed, false otherwise.

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(String title, String description, int priority, LocalDate dueDate)
      Updates the task details, including title, description, priority, and due date.
      Parameter:
      title - A String representing the updated title of the task.
      description - A String representing the updated description of the task.
      priority - An int representing the updated priority level of the task.
      dueDate - A LocalDate representing the updated due date of the task.

    • getCategory

      public String getCategory()
      Retrieves the category of the task. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define their specific category.
      Angegeben von:
      getCategory in Schnittstelle IHasCategory
      Gibt zurück:
      A String representing the category of the task, or null by default.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the task, including its category, title, priority, due date, and completion status.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      toString in Klasse Object
      Gibt zurück:
      A String describing the task in a readable format.
